ygData.subject: Re: BlackFortress
ygData.msgSnippet: As Hydras takes his temper tantrum on Night Shift, Night Shift delays his reply for just a moment.  A message, a silent com comes through to him from Tucson

As Hydras takes his temper tantrum on Night Shift, Night Shift delays his r=
eply for just a moment.  A message, a silent com comes through to him from =
Tucson Prime himself.  It simply reads..

" Don't risk your spark on my acc=
ount.  There's always a plan B."

Night Shift senses the com link.  He coul=
d now see that perhaps his plan was not working, yet he knew that his leade=
r was not upset in fact more concerned for his saftey more than anything el=
se.  It wasn't going according to plan and he knew it as well as Tucson did=
.  He had underestimated his enemies and it was begining to bleed through. =
 The best thing now was to tell the truth, and put up a good fight.  He nar=
rows his eyes.

" Ya want the truth huh?  Okay, I'll give ya the truth."

H=
e puts up his shoulder which has the Decepticon emblem and changes it immed=
iately to the Autobot symbol in front of Hydras.

"There's your truth!  You=
're right, I ain't a baddy after all, that's just a little trick I like ta =
play on creeps like you!  I can't fly because like Tucson Prime, I'M AN AUT=
OBOT and will always be AN AUTOBOT!  That little game was ta trick ya but I=
 can see you're too smart for that.  Well, now that ya know the truth, go a=
head, try'n blow me up lizard lips, because as soon as you do that, Tucson =
Prime's gonna be pretty slagged off and with a pair of missile launchers on=
 his cab I doubt you'll wanna mess with 'em now."  

As like Tucson Prime, =
Night Shift puts his bravest foot and tire forward.  He wasn't scared, he k=
new what would happen after mouthing off to Hydras, but he was proud of it.=
  Proud to stick up for himself and his fellow Autobots no matter the cost.=


" This time, I ain't lyn'!  You kick my aft, and he's gonna throttle your=
s!  And know somethn'?  I ain't gonna stop ya from don' that 'cause I wanna=
 see what happens next!"

He stares Hydras with a dirty stare.

g new, you Sneaky-bot??? Should I remind you that I, or better said my futu=
re self and same time past will murder or murdered PRIME???? a prime is lik=
e another one... WHY DID YOU DELAY TO REPORT THAT??? For first time and muc=
h better... WHY YOU ALWAYS APPEAR and DISAPPEAR with out trace and non know=
s your where-abouts?  none the higher ranks like ME?????"

> Night Shift remains in SUV form and=
 pivots his tires toward Hydras.
> 
> "That's right, you don't know what ha=
ppened do ya? Tucson's a Prime, he just got himself a sizeable upgrade from=
 the Matrix. See, with my dual programming, I can get the scoop on any fact=
ion's business I want. And the Autobot programming I got, enables me ta fin=
d these things out as they happen. And judgn' by the way my link reacted, y=
ou thought Rodimus got big guns? This guys' packn' more power than two nucl=
ear warheads combined. C'mon, if ya want power, Rodimus ain't the guy ta ge=
t it from. And I'm sure Rodimus would be really interested in tryn' ta take=
 down Tucson Prime, that's if you guys got enough back bone ta do it. Keep =
in mind, he's got as much strength as Optimus Prime, and that ain't nothn' =
ta sneeze at."
> 
> While keeping in Decepticon code, he tries to open his =
Autobot channel to Lord Elder, keeping him informed of his progress.
>

d collected, acting like a sly Decepticon. Inside he was nervous. If they f=
ound out his true faction he would clearly be done for. His resemblence to =
Tucson's old form was impecable, yet the only thing that separated him from=
 Tucson was his black paint job and his accent. He had been manufactured us=
ing the same specs and the same programming. Hopefully his configurations w=
ould not be found out.

r? I told ya everything ya need ta know and if I was one of them I wouldn't=

pticon, I may not be able ta fly but I am one of you guys. And thanks ta me=

ld give ya that kinda info."
